titleStmt.title: The complaint of Paules, to all Christian soules: or an humble supplication, to our good King and nation, for her newe reparation. Written by Henrie Farley. Amore, veritate, & reuerentia
titleStmt.author: Farley, Henry.

notesStmt.note: In verse. Advocating the repair of the cathedral.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
